    Jora Jobs Vacancies Homestay Front Desk

    October 23, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Homestay Front Desk position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    Widebed
    Job Qualifications:
    • Experience in hospitality/ short-term rent industry is a plus (training provided)
    • Friendly & passionate with tourism
    • Own smartphone
    • Excellent communication skills
    • Able to work on weekends and flexible schedule
    • Experience: Front Desk: 1 year (Preferred)
    Job Description:
    • Manage guest enquiries
    • Meet and welcome guest
    • Arrange check-in/out
    • Provide guest travel tips
    • Room quality checks
    • Inventory management
    • Manage cleaning/ laundry/ maintenance
    • Manage feedback
    • Reporting

    Company Overview

    Who are we?
    Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
    Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
    This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
    Your application will be redirected to them.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream hotel job in Kuala Lumpur.
    Apply Online

    SUPPORT HotelKini.com

    Join HotelKini social media group right now !!
    Get the latest Malaysia hotel jobs information directly from your fav social media, either Instagram / Telegram / Facebook / LinkedIn
